title: Who Can I Trust?
description:
Lisa's parents and husband warned her to be cautious around new people, and now Lisa isn't sure how to tell the difference between a nice person and a potential shark. - Dr. Laura: "Feelings follow thoughts. Choose positivity and trust your judgement."

Have you ever misjudged a person? Email me your thoughts at: drlaura@drlaura.com 

To participate on the radio program; call 1-800-Dr-Laura / 1-800-375-2872 or make an appointment - https://www.drlaura.com/make-an-appointment. 

Find me on social media at:

Facebook.com/DrLaura

Instagram.com/DrLauraProgram
